WorkItem.Description:
I've just given the library a shot, and my first two tests (run around 09:36 and 09:37 this morning) with Set-UIAScreenshot  have produced the following filenames:

2013112193723363_NotePad++.bmp
201311219366494_NotePad++.bmp


This clearly means leading zeroes in the "hours", "minutes" and "seconds" parts of the filename (and probably elsewhere, didn't check the code) are omitted, whereas they shouldn't...
WorkItem.Summary: Default filename for Save-UIAScreenshot uses incorrect format for date/time

Comments.Message:
Hi sba,
thank you for your request. It will be fixed in [the nearest beta of 0.8.7](https://uiautomation.codeplex.com/releases/view/114746) (most likely, in beginning of the next week).
